Below, we will remove all entries with missing geocodes, as this will raise an error when we enter the dataset into Google Maps.

So, let's do the following:

``` {python}
import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv('data/cleaned_crash_data.csv')

newdf = df.dropna(subset=['latitude', 'longitude'])
```

``` {python}
#Export of cleaned data
newdf.to_csv('google_maps_crash_import_data.csv', index = False)
```
